footer.footnote.statin: The calculator is not intended to show how risk increases or changes if statin therapy were stopped or was not initiated
footer.note.title: Please Note
footer.note.text: This tool is meant to provide estimated 10-year risks and simulate changes on therapy.  Decisions regarding therapy should be made by providers.  Therapy options are displayed for simulation purposes and do not represent therapy recommendations.  Patient eligibility for therapy should be determined by their doctor/provider.  Risk estimates on current therapy and intended therapy based on clinical-trial based relative risk reductions.  See "For Providers" Tab for more information.
footer.bp.title: Blood Pressure
footer.bp.text: Blood pressures are used to calculate 10-year risk. Relative risk reductions for blood pressure lowering depend on starting blood pressure and the patient population. Current guideline-recommended BP goals for patients with established cardiovascular disease are <130/<80.
footer.smoking.title: Smoking
footer.smoking.text: Smoking status used to calculate 10-year risk. Quitting smoking will lower risk. The impact of smoking cessation on 10-year risk depends on duration since quitting.
footer.about.title: About the Score
footer.about.text: The SMART-REACH score provides 10-year risk of cardiovascular events in patients with established cardiovascular disease. See provider tab for more details. Kaasenbrood L et al. J Am Heart Assoc 2018;7:e009217
